REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2388 reute r f BC-STRAWBRIDGE-<STRW>-DE 04-01 0042

TEXT.TITLE: STRAWBRIDGE <STRW> DECLARES STOCK DIVIDEND
TEXT.BODY: Strawbridge and Clothier said its board declared a seven pct stock dividend, payable May 14 to holders of record April 14. Earlier, the company reported net income of 20.7 mln dlrs. Reuter
